name: Blobby Flight
description:
Summary

I programmed Blobby Flight by myself as a part of my Unity portfolio.

It is a one-button Flappy Bird clone with a twist.

The target platform is Android. Downloadable versions and a web version are also available.

Controls:

  • SPACE (on web, Windows, and Linux)
  • Tap screen (on Android)

One tap - jump
Double tap - launch bomb
